content.text:
# Vice-President of Seychelles

|appointer       =
|termlength      =
|formation       = August 1996
|succession      =
|inaugural       = James Michel
|deputy          =
|salary          = R35,000 monthly
|website         =
}}
The vice-president of Seychelles is the second highest political office in the Republic of Seychelles. The position was created in 1996.
List of officeholders
;Political parties
|Seychelles People's Progressive Front (SPPF) → People's Party (PP) → United Seychelles (US)|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}
